scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This compilation contains copies, 114 pages, of genealogical material on the Berkeley family, collected and used by Richard Conner Limerick, II, in preparing his daughters' applications for the Daughters of the American Revolution. Included are copies of birth, marriage, and death certificates, church birth and burial records, census records, published data, and related documents.
